sn35.204:3.1: 204 The Interior and What’s Impermanent in the Past
sn35.204:4.1: “Mendicants, in the past the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind were impermanent.
sn35.204:4.4: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with proper understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’ …”
